scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 180 Ringing [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Record-Route:] Supported: timer,100rel Require: 100rel RSeq: 1 Contact: <sip:12345@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Length: 0
v=0 o=- 140987 140987 IN IP4 MSCPNGL1.MSS.DIGICEL.COM s=- c=IN IP4 10.249.54.35 t=0 0 a=sendrecv m=audio 31358 RTP/AVP 18 101 c=IN IP4 10.249.54.35 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=yes a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=ptime:20
